item.title: XPEV
item.description: score:-8 Chances: XPeng stock gains after Q2 earnings miss, indicating investor optimism. Positive upgrade and partnership news contribute to XPeng stock surge. Anticipated jump in Q3 deliveries and recovery hints for XPeng amid a wider loss. China’s EV market growth and increased deliveries potentially benefit XPeng.
